definition: classifier for hair or grass: tuft/Taiwan pr. [cuo4]
to pick up (a powder etc) with the fingertips/to scoop up/to collect together/to extract/to gather up/classifier: pinch/Taiwan pr. [cuo4]
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to play matchmaker/to act as a middleman
